title: The Blue Planet

awardsHtml:
6 wins & 12 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

2002 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Picture Editing for Non-Fiction Programming (Single or Multi-Camera)
Martin Elsbury (editor) (For episode "Seas of Life: Ocean World".)
2002 Winner Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Music Composition for a Series (Dramatic Underscore)
George Fenton (music composed by) (For episode "Seas of Life: Ocean World".)
2002 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Sound Editing for Non-Fiction Programming (Single or Multi-Camera)
Lucy Rutherford (sound editor) (For episode "Seas of Life: Deep".)
2002 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Sound Mixing for Non-Fiction Programming (Single or Multi-Camera)
Graham Wild (sound mixer) (For episode "Seas of Life: Deep".)
2002 Winner Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Cinematography for Non-Fiction Programming (Single or Multi-Camera)
Doug Allan (photography) - Simon Carroll (photography) - Bob Cranston (photography) - Michael deGruy (photography) - Yuri Farrant (photography) - Tom Fitz (photography) - Mark Gottlieb (photography) - Simon King (photography) - Ian McCarthy (photography) - Charles Maxwell (photography) - Didier Noirot (photography) - Michael Pitts (photography) - Rick Rosenthal (photography) - Peter Scoones (photography) - Paul Stewart (photography) (For episode "Seas of Life: Ocean World".)

BAFTA Awards

2002 Nominee BAFTA TV Award
Best Factual Series or Strand
2002 Nominee BAFTA TV Award
Best Innovation
Alastair Fothergill (For episode "The Deep".)
2002 Nominee Lew Grade Award
2002 Nominee BAFTA TV Award
Best Editing (Factual)
2002 Winner BAFTA TV Award
Best Original Television Music
George Fenton

Satellite Awards

2004 Nominee Golden Satellite Award
Best Documentary DVD
(For the Collector's Set.)

Broadcasting Press Guild Awards

2002 Winner Broadcasting Press Guild Award
Best Documentary Series

Television Critics Association Awards

2002 Nominee TCA Award
Outstanding Achievement in Movies, Miniseries and Specials

National Television Awards, UK

2002 Nominee National Television Award
Most Popular Factual Programme

Television and Radio Industries Club Awards

2002 Winner TRIC Award
TV Factual Programme of the Year

Royal Television Society, UK

2002 Nominee RTS Television Award
Best Science & Natural History
